/* * @Author: EmberCCC 1810888456@qq.com * @Date: 2022-07-04 15:21:36 * @LastEditors: EmberCCC 1810888456@qq.com * @LastEditTime: 2022-07-07 21:29:18 * @FilePath: \bl-device-manage-test\src\layouts\FormEdit\FormModal\Math_Modal.js * @Description: 这是默认设置,请设置`customMade`, 打开koroFileHeader查看配置 进行设置: https://github.com/OBKoro1/koro1FileHeader/wiki/%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AE */ import { Input } from 'antd'; import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react' import './index.css' const Math_Modal = (props) => { const ref = useRef(); const {title} = props useEffect(() => { return () => { const {setValue} = props console.log(ref.value); setValue(ref.value); } }) return (
{title}=
可用变量
函数
) } export default Math_Modal;
